scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Black & White Photograph of St. Mary's Lake, Glacier Park, Montana, signed by Nicholas Vachel Lindsay, at the Going-to-the-Sun Chalet, Glacier Park and bearing the inscription by him, "On the mountain peak called 'Going - to - the - Sun' I saw the Rooster that no storm can tame." black & white photograph. 1924 Jul 10.
